channel.title: Command help
channel.description:
Hey my source s Cheezescape pk
I want to allow admins to do [b]::pickup[/b] commands
and i want tele commands ex: [b]::tele varrok[/b]
Thanks

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @Omerata Omerata
item.description:
@Omerata wrote:

For ::pickup

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (/*newItemID <= 20000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Excist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type It Right ! "); } }
Note Player right’s. 1=Mod, 2=Admin, 3=Owner, 4=Owner without a crown.

For ::varrock

if (command.startsWith("varrock")) { sendMessage("You arrive in varrock"); teleportToX = 3210; teleportToY = 3424; }

And just for some other ones so you learn how to make them.=]

[code]if (command.startsWith(“fally”))
{
sendMessage(“You arrive in falador”);
teleportToX = 2964;
teleportToY = 3378;
}

if (command.startsWith(“ardy”))
{
sendMessage(“You arrive in ardy”);
teleportToX = 2662;
teleportToY = 3305;
}

if (command.startsWith(“lumby”))
{
sendMessage(“You arrive in lumbridge”);
teleportToX = 3222;
teleportToY = 3218;
}

if (command.startsWith(“cammy”))
{
sendMessage(“You arrive in camelot”);
teleportToX = 2757;
teleportToY = 3477;
}
[/code]

I hope this help’s you for when you come back.

Read full topic
